DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy treatment Promescent Lidocaine Spray compare placebo patient premature ejaculation .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Promescent Lidocaine Spray Men With Premature Ejaculation
DOC.detailed_description: Promescent Lidocaine Spray non-prescription drug market over-the-counter drug monograph ( 21 CFR Section 348.10 Subpart B ( ) ( 2 ) ) male genital desensitize drug product . In addition evaluate efficacy treatment Promescent , study evaluate patient ' subjective distress , perception improvement optimal dose , safety tolerability Promescent patient premature ejaculation respective partner .
DOC.criteria: Subject provide write informed consent screening . Subject male , 18 year age old . Subject meet diagnostic criterion premature ejaculation define DSMIVTR ( Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th Edition , Text Revision ; 2000 ) . Subject stable , monogamous , heterosexual relationship sexually active least last 6 month . Subject partner willing able engage sexual intercourse . Subject never achieve intravaginal ejaculation past 6 month ( i.e. , always ejaculate prior penetration ) . Subject form ejaculatory dysfunction ( e.g. , retrograde ejaculation , anejaculation , painful ejaculation ) . In opinion investigator , subject condition situation may put subject significant risk , may confound study result , may interfere significantly subject 's ability participate study .
